verbose_text: An induction of ROS by external stimuli has been shown to disrupt cell proliferation by blocking the cell cycle in many cell types including mouse Sertoli cells [XREF_BIBR], human pancreatic cancer cells [XREF_BIBR], human liver cells [XREF_BIBR], and C2C12 myoblasts [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: ROS by external stimuli has been shown to disrupt cell proliferation
